fields.fieldDescription: N/A
The full name of the facility type.
Indicates whether or not this facility is a revolver.
Indicates whether or not this facility is a term facility.
Indicates whether or not this facility is a letter of credit facility.
Indicates whether or not this facility is a demand facility.
Indicates whether or not a maturity date is required.
Indicates whether or not an expiry date is required.
Indicates whether or not an agreement date is required.
The code for the remote amortization method.
The code for the remote amortization income.
The code for the remote amortization balance.
The code for the unfunded amortization method.
The code for the unfunded amortization balance.
"The code for the Funded Before Expiry Date Method, defaults to 'DEF' ."
"The code for the Funded Before Expiry Date Income, defaults to 'CMFEE'."
"The code for the Funded Before Expiry Date Balance, defaults to 'DISC' ."
"The code for the Funded After Expiry Date Method, defaults to 'DEF' ."
"The code for the Funded After Expiry Date Income, defaults to 'CMFEE'."
"The code for the Funded After Expiry Date Balance, defaults to 'DISC'."
Indicates whether or not this facility type is active.
Indicates whether or not this facility type may be deactivated.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
Indicates whether or not the facility is advised.
Indicates whether or not the facility is legally binding.
"Currenty, this indicator is used to identify facilities that lie behind Bonds.  Facilities having an isSecurity = 'Y' value will not be treated as regular facilities but rather as bonds/securities."
Usage threshold.
The code for the unfunded amortization income.
Indicator which specifies whether this facility is a background facility.
